#summary Acceptance criteria scenarios on User Story 15

*User Story*

As contestant<br/>
I want to register into the system<br/>
so that I can log in<br/>

The needed information about every user is:<br/>
username,<br/>
password,<br/>
email,<br/>
first name(optional)<br/>
last name(optional)<br/>

*Scenario 1*

  # Go to the "register" page<br/>
  # There must be five textfields - username, password, email, first name, last name<br/>

*Scenario 2*

  # Go to the "register" page<br/>
  # Fill all fields except username<br/>
  # Press "register" button<br/>
  # Registration must be unsuccessfull - information about blank field must be given<br/>

*Scenario 3*

  # Go to the "register" page<br/>
  # Fill all fields. For "email" field type incorrect email (e.g. asd@  , asd@sdfsd)<br/>
  # Press "register" button<br/>
  # Registration must be unsuccessfull - information about the incorrect email must be given<br/>


*Scenario 4*

  # Go to the "register" page<br/>
  # Fill all fields with correct data.<br/>
  # Press "register" button<br/>
  # Registration must be successfull - information about the successful registration must be given<br/>
